name: Scalabl Design System
description:
Scalabl is built to aim for consistent and stand-out interfaces. Loaded with fully customizable elements and curated style guide. A finely built professional design system for Figma.

Some of its features are-
▶️ Accurate typography system to create perfect hierarchy.
▶️ Change colors anywhere with a single click.
▶️ Precise spacing system to stay consistent.
▶️ Speed up with fully customizable 100+ components library.

What it includes-
▶️ 100+ Components
▶️ Typography system
▶️ Spacing system
▶️ Color guide
▶️ Auto layout added
▶️ Neatly named layers
▶️ Beautifully organized
